item.title: Post: [2022-07-15 Fri 15:15]
item.description: This week the Linux partition is EndeavourOS — specifically Qtile Community Edition.
item.content:encoded:
This week the Linux partition is EndeavourOS — specifically Qtile Community Edition.

you have to add a few things to make tiling window manager screenshots interesting

So far, I like it.

And yeah, I think I still want the tumblelog for sharing quick links and what not. I’ll tie it in a bit more closely with the main blog, but I will let it live as its own separate site.

item.title: Post: [2022-06-18 Sat 07:37]
item.description: Oh hey. https://regolith-linux.org redirects to https://regolith-desktop.com, and I see nothing about Regolith Desktop being in beta anymore. Guess it’s time to update!
item.content:encoded:
Oh hey. https://regolith-linux.org redirects to https://regolith-desktop.com, and I see nothing about Regolith Desktop being in beta anymore.

Guess it’s time to update!
